TABLE.NAME: practicalabsubmission_file
TABLE.COMMENT: Info about file submissions for practicalabments

FIELD.NAME: numfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of files the student submitted.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this submission info.

KEY.NAME: practicalabment
KEY.COMMENT: The practicalabment instance this submission relates to

KEY.NAME: submission
KEY.COMMENT: The submission this file submission relates to.
